imgDesc.text:
The targets will come up in order. When the targeting light turns blue, you must attack the targets <color=#ffe14b>in the order in which they came up</color> . Successfully following this order 4 times will complete the challenge. Conversely, attacking in the wrong order a certain number of times will cause you to fail.
Manually interrupting the challenge or leaving the challenge area will also cause you to fail.
